Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory506.jpg'}
{3: 'It has been 28 days since Liv left for Babylonia. This is also the 10th afternoon they have spent stuck in the church.'}
{3: 'Dusk falls onto the blood stains covering the churchyard, hoping to conceal them, only to accentuate the crimson color.'}
{3: 'After the twins left, the train finally came to a halt next to a forest in the middle of nowhere, its limit reached.'}
{3: 'Before they could perform any repairs, they were soon surrounded by waves of Hetero-Creatures, and they were forced to retreat and put up defenses inside this nameless church.'}
{3: 'Having tried to break through the enemies several times, they only ever find themselves cornered in a new location.'}
{3: 'Those twisted horrors have marked their names. Those creatures will haunt them every step of the way like shadows, inseparable.'}
{3: 'In order to contain the destruction, the three of them decided to stay in the church, using it as a base of operation.'}
{3: 'But no fights can go on forever. They have been resisting on church grounds for ten days after the pursuit of Asslam.'}
{3: 'With their supplies lost, their resources are about to be depleted when one of their terminals finally rings.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory462.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Hey there, how are you all holding up?', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Whoa, you look terrible.', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "But that's alright, 'cause we're bringing you some supplies, and we've also brought a few Babylonia Constructs to help you.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't come here, it's too dangerous. Akdilek is struggling too, so please look after yourselves first.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Relax. Akdilek has been working with the Nighter, so don't you worry about us.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "After we got settled, we went back for some of Watanabe's folks as well.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I know it's pretty bad where you are, so stop turning us away. We just borrowed these supplies from the Nighter anyway.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "We're almost there. I bet you're all feeling very grateful.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "How are Jamilah's injuries?"}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Pulao got us someone who can help.', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Good.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Sit back, don't give up. We'll be there soon enough.", 4: '13'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ending the transmission, Lucia returns to the dust-filled room and its dreary silence.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It was Changyu and Sophia. They're bringing us some supplies to repair ourselves...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I told them not to come, but they insisted and said they'd be here soon.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lee does not answer. He is on the brink of collapse, his broken right arm yet to be properly repaired, deteriorating from infection.'}
{3: 'Dusk and silence, exhaustion and wounds, they weave together a web that binds the two of them to the bench they are sitting on, with no hope to escape.'}
{3: 'Even with all their struggles, time has not granted them room to breathe.'}
{3: 'Only when a speck of dust falls on her shoulder from the chandelier in the church does Lucia drag her damaged frame up, supporting herself with her katana.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "They're back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'll get Chrome. His frozen attacks can still buy us some time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Any news from Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No. But our mission report and reinforcement request have been received.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Have they abandoned us?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia does not answer. Lucia does not know how to answer.'}
{3: 'They are already knee-deep in an impossible situation. The Hetero-Creatures would still fight to their death even if Babylonia sent in armies and transport crafts now.'}
{3: 'When the cost of a rescue mission outweighs the result, no one life is worth more than a dozen others.'}
{3: "To Lucia and Lee, Gray Raven's spirit will live on as long as Liv and 【kuroname】 are safe on Babylonia."}
{3: 'Except...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We promised... the four of us will always be together.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's too soon to give up. Changyu and Sophia are still on the way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The devices that you made. Are there any left?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'No one is willing to fall here.'}
{3: 'Even when their lives are like candles in the wind, their spirits are still burning bright.'}
